name: Elvis Smash Burger
description: Smash burgers Elvis style with peanut butter, caramelized bananas and bacon!
ingredients: 4 buns, sliced and optionally toasted/grilled (gluten-free for gluten-free)
instructions: Divide the beef into 8 (2 ounce) portions and form them into balls. Heat a pan (preferably cast iron, carbon steel or stainless steel) over medium-high heat. Add 2 to 4 balls to the pan, leaving plenty of space around them, smash them down into thin patties and season generously with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes, before flipping, and cooking the other side, about 1-2 minutes. Assemble the burgers and enjoy!
